channel.title: Cybersecurity on Try Harder
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Try Harder

item.title: SQL Injection Attacks: Complete Guide to Prevention and Defense
item.description: SQL injection remains one of the most dangerous web application vulnerabilities, responsible for 33% of all web breaches in 2023. This comprehensive guide explains how these attacks work, their real-world impact, and effective defense strategies for developers and security professionals.
